{"rule":"COMMA_PARENTHESIS_WHITESPACE","sentence":"^\\QHuHaHei </head> <body> <script> let sequence = [1, 2, 1, 2, 2, 2] function execute_next_move(n){ let next_move = sequence[n]; createArrow(next_move); if(n-1<sequence.length){ setTimeout(execute_next_move, 2000, n+1);} } document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () { execute_next_move(0); }); function createArrow(n) { const arrowContainer = document.createElement('div'); if (n == 1){ arrowContainer.classList.add('arrow_top'); } if (n == 2){ arrowContainer.classList.add('arrow_side'); } if (n == 3) { arrowContainer.classList.add('arrow_f'); } document.body.appendChild(arrowContainer); arrowContainer.addEventListener('animationiteration', function () { arrowContainer.remove(); }); } </script> </body> </html>\\E$"}
